Generation VIII.Sword: This Cramorant has accidentally gotten a Pikachu lodged in its gullet. Cramorant is choking a little, but it isn't really bothered.
Generation VIII.Shield: The half-swallowed Pikachu is so startled that it isn't struggling yet, but it's still looking for a chance to strike back.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its throat is clearly not wide enough to swallow a Pikachu, and yet Cramorant makes no move to release its catch.
Generation IX.Violet: With a Pikachu stuck in its throat, Cramorant can use Pikachu's prickling electricity to give its opponents a shock.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 9 , Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage , Stony Wilderness Axew's Eye ( Wanderer ) Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 9 , Bridge Field , Lake of Outrage , Stony Wilderness Axew's Eye ( Wanderer ) Giant's Cap , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Challenge Beach , Forest of Focus , Training Lowlands Challenge Beach , Forest of Focus ( Wanderer ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
